hero.subtitle: is a TradingView strategy developed for systematic, automated trading. It follows predefined rules to analyze the market, execute trades, and manage risk consistently.
hero.tagline: Automated trading built to simplify decisions and enforce discipline.

note.title: Our philosophy:
note.desc: ensure disciplined trading and consistent execution, regardless of market conditions.

features1.title: What You Get
features1.contentDesc: Focused on identifying meaningful opportunities — not constant activity.

items.title: Market Analysis
items.description: Detects trends and structural market shifts using objective price data.

items.title: Adaptive Behavior
items.description: Adjusts its logic as market dynamics change over time.

items.title: Automated Execution
items.description: Trades are executed instantly and consistently based on defined rules.

features2.contentDesc: Built to protect capital and enforce consistency.

items.title: Risk Controls
items.description: Integrated safeguards help limit drawdowns and control exposure.

items.title: Overtrading Protection
items.description: Reduces trading activity during low-quality or unclear market phases.

items.title: Configurable Parameters
items.description: Risk levels and strategy behavior can be adjusted to individual preferences.

steps.title: Simple by Design
steps.subtitle: The strategy runs directly on TradingView. It continuously analyzes price data, generates trade signals based on predefined rules, and executes positions automatically.

items.title: Data — Indicator Signal
items.description: Market conditions are analyzed by our proprietary indicator.

items.title: Logic — Signal to Trade
items.description: Signals are transmitted via webhook and converted into structured trade instructions.

items.title: Execution — Order Placement
items.description: Validated trade instructions are executed automatically.

chart.title: Built on Data
chart.subtitle: The strategy is tested using historical market data to understand how it behaves in trending, ranging, and volatile environments.

items.name: Emily Kennedy
items.testimonial: The designs are not only visually appealing but also highly professional.

items.name: Sarah Hansen
items.testimonial: It beautifully showcases my work, with its clean and elegant design.

items.name: Mark Wilkinson
items.testimonial: I discovered these templates and I am impressed by their variety and quality.

faqs.title: Good to Know
faqs.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions.

items.title: Which markets and timeframes are supported?
items.description: Our strategy is optimized for Bitcoin but can be applied to other volatile assets.

items.title: How does the system handle market volatility?
items.description: The strategy adapts dynamically to changing market conditions.

items.title: Are all trades profitable?
items.description: No. Not every trade will be profitable.

cta.subtitle: Automate your strategy, enforce discipline and eliminate the guesswork.

items.title: Adaptives Verhalten

items.title: Automatisierte Ausführung
items.description: Trades werden sofort und konsistent auf der Grundlage definierter Regeln ausgeführt.

features2.contentDesc: Entwickelt, um Kapital zu schützen und Konsistenz durchzusetzen.
